p: The Malthusian models and surveillance data were shown in Fig 6. According to the simulation model with no intervention, the total number of the cases would be 1728 with a TAR of 31.21% (95%CI: 29.99%â€“ 32.43%). This result revealed that the AE and RE of the integrated outbreak control strategy implemented by Ningbo Municipal CDC were 30.72% and 98.44%, respectively.
